sensor.name: Name
sensors.health.indicator.threshold: Health indicator threshold (in days). Add an indicator which allows to know if the sensor has sent a value since this value.
sensor.alert.on.battery.low.message: Sensor %@ doesn't seem to be reachable. Please check battery.
sensor.alert.on.battery.low.message.batl: Sensor %@'s battery level is %@. Please change battery.
sensor.alert.on.battery.ok: Sensor %@ is now reachable. You can ignore this alert.
sensor.alert.on.battery.ok.batlevel: Le capteur %@ is now ok with a battery level of %@%.
